name: Ludum Dare 46 (Damoy)
description:
Hello Roger the TV lover !

You have been teleported to the age of "Le Roi Arthur" because of a magic remote control.

Yes, this is an astonishing news. You have to keep it alive and bring it to the castle in order to save the King who has been attacked by the Knights of "La Table Ronde".

The magic contained in the remote control (and produced by Merlin) will allow to save the King.  Well, it was the initial story background. 

We were two guys working on a adventure 2D game from scratch using Python Pygame library. We had less time than expected (initially planning for the Ludum and not the compo) and were new with the tech.

So not really a success !
Still, good to share :)
